page.title: 03Typical Farm of Clun Area
page.content: Mr Jones of Cwm Ffrydd does mixed farming.He has been in the farming business all his life. He farms 256 acres. This year 105 acres will grow silage, 32 acres will grow grain and the rest is pasture (some of which will grow hay). He uses the following equipment and machinery: 4 trailers, baler,4 tractors, block cutter, corndrill, Land Rover, roller, cattle trailer, link box, combine harvester, silage equipment, chain harrow, muck spreader, elevator, rotavator, cement mixer, fertilizer spreader, plough and mower. Mr Jones has a flock of 310 ewes half of which are the Clun Forest breed. All lambs go to market as fat except for 70 which are kept as replacements. He has 90 calves up to 12 months old. Mr Jones goes to market about 12 times with sheep and 12 times with cows in a year.
